text: The Mapuche football team is a football team representing the Mapuche of the Chile and Argentina and is controlled by the Mapuche Football Association founded in 2007. The stated mission of the team is "...to allow Mapuche as a distinct cultural entity, with common interests to be represented at the international level in the sport. Mapuche is a member of ConIFA and CSANF.Mapuche member ConIFA (CONIFA)Mapuche member ConIFA (CSANF)Mapuche member CSANF (CSANF) Mapuche will participate in the 2020 ConIFA World Football Cup.Who Has Qualified for the World Football Cup 2020 So Far (CONIFA) Mapuche won the 2015 Championship national football of native peoples.Mapuche: indigenous communities in Latin America hold their own Copa America in Chile (UNPO) The selection of Mapuche appears in a fake documentary, in the 1942 FIFA World Cup in Patagonia and wins the competition in the final against Germany (2–1).The missing World Cup finally found (Télérama)The Forgotten World Cup (Valeurs actuelles)The Lost World Cup (ESPN Inc.)When the 1942 World Cup was played by the Mapuche (Le Républicain Lorrain)In search of the lost
